title: Buri muryango ugomba kumenya ko
content:
**1**.Malariya iterwa n’agakoko ka plasimodiyumu gakwirakwizwa n’umubu 
w’ingore wa Anoferi. Kuryama mu nzitiramubu ikoranye umuti ni bumwe mu 
buryo bw’ingenzi bwo kuyirinda.
Abantu bose bakeneye kurindwa malariya cyane cyane abagore batwite 
n’abana. Ibyo bikorwa nijoro, izuba rimaze kurenga, na mbere y’uko rirasa 
kuko ari bwo imibu irumana.
Inzitiramibu zikoranye umuti zigomba gukoreshwa umwaka wose, n’iyo haba 
atari igihe hariho umubu, nko ku gihe cy’izuba.

**2**.Mu turere twiganjemo Malariya abana baba bugarijwe kurusha abandi. Igihe 
cyose umwana ate umuriro agomba kujyanwa ku mujyanama w’ubuzima 
cyangwa kwa muganga kugirango asuzumwe, avurwe hakiri kare.
Iyo umwana ate umuriro, yanga kurya, ahitwa, aruka, ndetse yacitse intege 
agomba kujyanwa kwa muganga, cyangwa ku mujyanama w’ubuzima kuko 
ashobora kuba yarwaye malariya. Umwana urwaye malariya agomba kuran-
giza imiti, n’iyo indwara yahita ikira. Iyo atarangije imiti, malariya ishobora 
gukara bikagora kuyivura.

**4**.Hari serivisi zite mu nshingano kuboneza urubyaro zitanga inama n’ubumenyi ku 
bagabo n’abagore, ku buryo bwo kuboneza urubyaro, guhitamo no guteganya 
umubare w’abana bazabyara. Hari uburyo bwinshi butandukanye kandi bwizewe 
bufasha kwirinda gusama utabiteganyije.

**5**.Uburyo bwo kuboneza urubyaro ari inshingano zaburi wese yaba umugore 
cyangwa umugabo. Bakwiye kumenya kandi ibyiza biri mu kuboneza urubyaro 
n’uburyo butandukanye bukoreshwa.
Inama ku buryo bwo kuboneza urubyaro bashobora kuzisanga kwa muganga, mu 
babyaza, ku kigo nderabuzima cyangwa ku kigo cy’ubujyanama ku kuboneza
urubyaro.
